testcase.classname: Order T-Shirt and Verify in Order History
testcase.name: Login with valid usernae and password
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page.........................................passed When title of login page is Login - My Store................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed When title of home page is My account - My Store............................passed Then print massege user logged in successfully..............................passed

testcase.classname: Order T-Shirt and Verify in Order History
testcase.name: Placing T-Shirt Order
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on T-shirt page........................................passed Then user should click on Add to cart.......................................passed Then user should click on proced to checkout................................passed Then user should click on proced to checkout on address tab.................passed Then user should click on proceed to checkout on Shipping tab...............passed Then user should select pay by bank wire....................................passed Then print message order placed seccessfully................................passed

testcase.classname: Order T-Shirt and Verify in Order History
testcase.name: Verify order in order history
testcase.system-out: Given extract order ref id from placed order................................passed Then click on back to order button..........................................passed Then extract first order item ref id from order history page................passed Then compare both ref id both ref id should be same.........................passed Then print message order found in history page..............................passed
